project.description: Running Cognizant Intelligent Test Scripter Testcases from Jenkins

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ProjectLocation
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The Cognizant Intelligent Test Scripter Project Location Relative to Workspace

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: ExecutionMode
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: TestDesign to run TestCases, TestExecution to run Testsets

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Release_R_Scenario
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The Release Name if 'ExecutionMode' is 'TestExecution' The Scenario Name if 'ExecutionMode' is 'TestDesign'

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TestSet_R_TestCase
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The TestSet Name if 'ExecutionMode' is 'TestExecution' The TestCase Name if 'ExecutionMode' is 'TestDesign'

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BrowserName
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Chrome | Firefox | IE | No Browser | Emulator Name Only Needed if 'ExecutionMode' is 'TestDesign'

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: AdditionalArgs
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Additional Arguments if any Check CLI.

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command: IF "%ExecutionMode%"=="TestDesign" ( SET RUN_PROP=-scenario "%Release_R_Scenario%" -testcase "%TestSet_R_TestCase%" -browser "%BrowserName%" ) ELSE ( SET RUN_PROP=-release "%Release_R_Scenario%" -testset "%TestSet_R_TestCase%" ) SET STATUS=Run.bat -project_location "%ProjectLocation%" %RUN_PROP% -latest_exe_status FOR /F "tokens=* USEBACKQ" %%F IN (`%STATUS%`) DO ( SET result=%%F ) SET result=%result: =% IF "%result%" == "0" ( exit 1 )
